          <title>
            <string language="fi">Nukkalanka</string>
            <string language="en">Tufting yarn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchheftendes Garn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Filé ornant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fio adornando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Filato di trapunto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματίζοντας τούφες νήμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hilado que empenacha</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Mustavalkoinen viivapiirros nukkalangan solmimisesta.</string>
            <string language="en">Black-and-white line drawing of attaching a tufting yarn in the weave.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">nukkalanka</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwarzweiss-Zeile Zeichnung der Befestigung 
eines durchheftenden Garns in der Webart.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne noire et blanche schéma d'attacher un 
filé ornant dans l'armure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha black-and-white desenho de unir um fio 
adornando no weave.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga in bianco e nero illustrazione di fissaggio 
del filato di trapunto nel tessuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραπτό σχέδιο γραμμών της ένωσης ενός σχηματίζοντας 
τούφες νήματος στην ύφανση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Línea blanca y negro gráfico de asociar un 
hilado que empenacha en la armadura.</string>
          </description>
